title: Champion Men's Hoodie, Reverse Weave, Fleece Comfortable Pullover Sweatshirt For Men
description: THE FIT - Loose men’s unisex fit leaves room for layers and movement.
THE FEEL - Crafted with a 12 oz. heavyweight fleece that’s brushed on the interior for comfort and warmth.
THE LOOK - Ribbed collar, cuffs, and hem with full hood give this men’s sweatshirt a classic sweatshirt look.
SMART DESIGN - This men’s hoodie is cut on the cross grain to reduce vertical shrinkage.
ADDED MOBILITY - Signature ribbed panels help increase your range of motion.
THE REVERSE WEAVE COLLECTION - Our OG, heavyweight iconic fleece features a brushed interior, durable construction, and signature stretch panels for easy movement.
Champion Men'S Hoodie, Reverse Weave, Fleece Comfortable Pullover Sweatshirt For Men
